Author: n00bii
Text: No worries!! It’s just tough I feel like it’s a never ending battle. U can be doing so great and then suddenly something triggering happens and you’re back to out of control emotional binges..

Author: YouGoatToBeKittenMe
Text: I don't relate but if this only comes from when you drink, just drink less I guess. I don't see how else to get around this in the short term. Sorry I'm not much help
